verses.verse: "And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> 'O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> the <S%H340>enemy<s%> has <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H1889>'Aha!<s%>' and, 'The <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1116>heights<s%> have <S%H1961>become<s%> our <S%H4181>possession,<s%>'

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "For good <S%H3282>cause<s%> they have <S%H8074>made<s%> you <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H9575>crushed<s%> you from <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> that you should <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4181>possession<s%> of the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you have been <S%H5927>taken<s%> up in the <S%H8193>talk<s%> and the <S%H1681>whispering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"' "

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>ravines<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> to the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%> and to the <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%> and a <S%H3933>derision<s%> to the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H518>"Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of My <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>appropriated<s%> My <S%H776>land<s%> for themselves as a <S%H4181>possession<s%> with <S%H3605>wholehearted<s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> [and] with <S%H7589>scorn<s%> of <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H1644>drive<s%> it out for a <S%H957>prey.<s%>"

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>ravines<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in My <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> you have <S%H5375>endured<s%> the <S%H3639>insults<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> 'I have <S%H5375>sworn<s%> <S%H3027><s%> that <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> you will <S%H1992>themselves<s%> <S%H5375>endure<s%> their <S%H3639>insults.<s%>

'But you, O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you will <S%H5414>put<s%> forth your <S%H6057>branches<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> for My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for they will <S%H7126>soon<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>
'For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am for you, and I will <S%H6437>turn<s%> to you, and you shall be <S%H5647>cultivated<s%> and <S%H2232>sown.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> on you, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it; and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> will be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> will be <S%H1129>rebuilt.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and they will <S%H7235>increase<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful;<s%> and I will cause you to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as you were <S%H6927>formerly<s%> and will <S%H3190>treat<s%> you <S%H3190>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> at the <S%H7221>first.<s%> Thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Yes, I will cause <S%H120>men<s%> – My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> – to <S%H1980>walk<s%> on you and <S%H3423>possess<s%> you, so that you will <S%H1961>become<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of <S%H7921>children.<s%>'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to you, "You are a <S%H398>devourer<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and have <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> your <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H7921>children,<s%> "

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> you will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H7921>bereave<s%> your <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H7921>children,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And I will not let you <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3639>insults<s%> from the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5750>anymore,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will you <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will you cause your <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>' "
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> when the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3427>living<s%> in their own <S%H127>land,<s%> they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it by their <S%H1870>ways<s%> and their <S%H5949>deeds;<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me was like the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of a woman in her <S%H5079>impurity.<s%>

"Therefore, I <S%H8210>poured<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H8210>shed<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it with their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

"Also I <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they were <S%H2219>dispersed<s%> throughout the <S%H776>lands.<s%> According to their <S%H1870>ways<s%> and their <S%H5949>deeds<s%> I <S%H8199>judged<s%> them.

"When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>went,<s%> they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> because it was <S%H559>said<s%> of them, <S%H428>'These<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> yet they have <S%H3381>come<s%> out of His <S%H776>land.<s%>'

"But I had <S%H2550>concern<s%> for My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>went.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "It is not for your <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that I am about to <S%H6213>act,<s%> but for My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>went.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6942>vindicate<s%> the <S%H6942>holiness<s%> of My <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> which has been <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%> Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "when I <S%H6942>prove<s%> Myself <S%H6942>holy<s%> among you in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
"For I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you from the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>lands,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> you into your own <S%H127>land.<s%>

"Then I will <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on you, and you will be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

"Moreover, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you; and I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> from your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you and <S%H6213>cause<s%> you to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and you will be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
"And you will <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your forefathers; so you will be My <S%H1>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H5971>God.<s%>

"Moreover, I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2932>uncleanness;<s%> and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for the <S%H1715>grain<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> it, and I will not <S%H5414>bring<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> on you.

"And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> and the <S%H8570>produce<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that you may not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> the <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"Then you will <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>deeds<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good,<s%> and you will <S%H6962>loathe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

"I am not <S%H6213>doing<s%> [this] for your <S%H4616>sake,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "let it be <S%H3045>known<s%> to you. Be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> I will cause the <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> will be <S%H1129>rebuilt.<s%>

"And the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H5647>cultivated<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1961>being<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H5674>passed<s%> by.

"And they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1976>'This<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and the <S%H2720>waste,<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%> [and] <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>'

"Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1129>rebuilt<s%> the <S%H2040>ruined<s%> places [and] <S%H5193>planted<s%> that which was <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and will <S%H6213>do<s%> it."

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H5750>also<s%> I will let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1875>ask<s%> Me to <S%H6213>do<s%> for them: I will <S%H7235>increase<s%> their <S%H120>men<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

"Like the <S%H6629>flock<s%> for <S%H6944>sacrifices,<s%> like the <S%H6629>flock<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> during her <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will the <S%H2720>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H4392>filled<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "
